history.content: I'm not sure that our faculty have scheduled midterms already, so the best people to ask would be the instructors of the course, especially if you may need accommodations.

children.subject: The class will be large enough that the midterm will have to be held in the evening and spread over multiple different rooms/locations.  You should be on the lookout for the details of the midterm schedule at the beginning of the class next semester however.

history.content:
Hello,

I'm trying to take both CS169 and EE16A next semester. I know they have time conflicts, but I heard EE16A will at least be webcasted.

From previous years that Fox/Patterson have taught CS169, I've heard there is no final, but there are in class quizzes. So I think if I do take both, taking the final for EE16A will be fine, but I was wondering if the midterms for EE16A were scheduled during class? If so, is it possible to schedule the midterms to a different time, if we contact ahead of time?
history.subject: EE16A Midterm Scheduling
